docs.text: Quick Start 依赖 编程使用 HOCON 配置 服务自动注册 HOCON 完整配置 Akka Discovery 依赖 配置 Play WS 使用 使用
docs.title: Nacos SDK for Scala

docs.text:
要在项目中使用，请添加以下依赖：
sbt libraryDependencies += "me.yangbajing.nacos4s" %% "nacos-client-scala" % "1.0.1" Maven <dependency>
  <groupId>me.yangbajing.nacos4s</groupId>
  <artifactId>nacos-client-scala_2.12</artifactId>
  <version>1.0.1</version>
</dependency> Gradle dependencies {
  compile group: 'me.yangbajing.nacos4s', name: 'nacos-client-scala_2.12', version: '1.0.1'
}
并添加以下依赖源：
resolvers += Resolver.bintrayRepo("helloscala", "maven")
docs.title: 依赖

docs.text:
import yangbajing.nacos4s.client.naming.Nacos4sNamingService
import yangbajing.nacos4s.client.util.Nacos4s

object NamingDemo extends App {
  val namingService: Nacos4sNamingService = Nacos4s.namingService("127.0.0.0:8848", "")
  val status = namingService.getServerStatus
  assert(status == "UP")
}
docs.title: Nacos4sNamingService

docs.text:
import yangbajing.nacos4s.client.config.Nacos4sConfigService
import yangbajing.nacos4s.client.util.Nacos4s

object ConfigDemo extends App {
  val configService: Nacos4sConfigService = Nacos4s.configService("127.0.0.0:8848", "")
  val status = configService.getServerStatus
  assert(status == "UP")
}
docs.title: Nacos4sConfigService
HOCON 配置

docs.text: 在使用 ConfigFactory 初始化 Nacos4sNamingService 时设置 autoRegisterInstance = on 可自动将服务注册到 Nacos。
docs.title: 服务自动注册
HOCON 完整配置

docs.text:
要在项目中使用，请添加以下依赖：
sbt libraryDependencies += "me.yangbajing.nacos4s" %% "nacos-akka" % "1.0.1" Maven <dependency>
  <groupId>me.yangbajing.nacos4s</groupId>
  <artifactId>nacos-akka_2.12</artifactId>
  <version>1.0.1</version>
</dependency> Gradle dependencies {
  compile group: 'me.yangbajing.nacos4s', name: 'nacos-akka_2.12', version: '1.0.1'
}
docs.title: 依赖
配置

docs.text:
要在项目中使用，请添加以下依赖：
sbt libraryDependencies += "me.yangbajing.nacos4s" %% "nacos-play-ws" % "1.0.1" Maven <dependency>
  <groupId>me.yangbajing.nacos4s</groupId>
  <artifactId>nacos-play-ws_2.12</artifactId>
  <version>1.0.1</version>
</dependency> Gradle dependencies {
  compile group: 'me.yangbajing.nacos4s', name: 'nacos-play-ws_2.12', version: '1.0.1'
}
